meanings.definition: The process of removing oxygen from a substance.
meanings.sent1: During the deoxidation of the metal, oxygen is taken out.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use deoxidation to make steel stronger.
meanings.sent3: The deoxidation of the cake batter made it rise perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the deoxidation of a room filled with tension.
meanings.sent5: The deoxidation of the pond water revealed sparkling fish below.

meanings.definition: The act of reducing the amount of oxygen in a chemical compound.
meanings.sent1: In chemistry class, we learned about the deoxidation of compounds.
meanings.sent2: The deoxidation of the solution changed its color.
meanings.sent3: The deoxidation of the air freshener made it lose its scent.
meanings.sent4: His deoxidation of the conversation made it more pleasant.
meanings.sent5: The deoxidation of the plant's leaves improved its health.
